subject: Football
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: The lawyer for the former N.F.L. star Chad Johnson said the backside pat Johnson gave him in court was not meant as disrespectful to a judge — and did not warrant 30 days in jail.
snippet: The lawyer for the former N.F.L. star Chad Johnson said the backside pat Johnson gave him in court was not meant as disrespectful to a judge — and did not warrant 30 days in jail.
